widget.name: DropdownSelector
widget.description: Enhancement of the standard html form dropdown element for usability and UX purposes. Adds a placeholder functionality as well as the creation of a stylable version of the dropdown and it's elements.

property.caption: Target dropdown
property.description: Enter the name of the dropdown that needs to be enhanced.

property.caption: Target Attribute Name
property.description: Enter the name of the dropdown that needs to be enhanced.

property.caption: Rendering Mode
property.description: The visual rendering of the select

enumerationValues.enumerationValue: replace select field and dropdown menu

property.caption: Fix menu positioning
property.description: Uses fixed positioning for the dropdown menu. Only use it for when encountering scrollcontainer layout issues for performance wise this is a heavy operation

property.caption: Prevent drop up
property.description: For Full Rendering Mode, the widget automatically determines to drop down or up. This allows for always dropping down.

property.caption: Prevent resize
property.description: Prevent the dropdown menu's ability to resize to fit the available space in the screen. Note: doens't work with fixed positioning.

property.caption: Use default on device
property.description: Keep the traditional select element when using tablet or mobile
